title: Ticket #2168: Better document how to deal with exit codes of scripts
description: Add some notes to the documentation to the effect that PRE and POST scripts should generally explicitly specify an exit code, as opposed to just allowing the exit code of the last command to get passed up. Give the example of tar returning a non-zero exit code when this wasn't expected. (From today's meeting with Spalding lab people.)
